summary: THE RACK AND PINION IN MY 1997 PONTIAC GRAND PRIX IS NOT ALLOWING ME TO TURN LEFT WITH THE ASSISTANCE OF POWER STEERING. THERE WAS A RECALL ON A LOWER PINION BEARING, WHICH I HAD REPLACED. THE PROBLEM STILL EXISTS AFTER ALL OF THE RECALL  REPAIRS WERE FINISHED. I BELIEVE THAT WHEN THE LOWER PINION BEARING WENT OUT IT CAUSED MORE DAMAGE TO THE STEERING RACK.
